title.rendered: Medical Records Clerk – TEMP | Tulsa, OK

content.rendered:
Medical Records Clerk – TEMP | Tulsa, Oklahoma
  • Full-Time, Monday-Friday 8am-5pm
  • Temporary starting in mid-July for 4-6 weeks
  • Experience with EMR required
  • Prefer previous medical records or front desk reception experience
  • $10/hour
